resources.string: Click here to temporarily turn off SafeMode
Time to turn off must be in the future!

Welcome to SafeMode! (v1.0)

Copyright 2011 Mike Depinet and Boris Treskunov


 To get started, select contacts to add to your blacklist (by using the "Edit Blacklist" option in the menu). 

Then you can start SafeMode by pushing the "Start SafeMode" button. This will ask you for a time at which SafeMode will turn off automatically. 

Until the time selected, the contacts in your blacklist will be unavailable (so that you cannot call, text, email, or IM them). 

To turn off SafeMode early, you may push the "End SafeMode" button. This will require you to prove sobriety, then turn off SafeMode. 

Now then, enjoy your party! 
 
SafeMode --Keeping you responsible while you're being irresponsible.
